backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing contact form submissions and user profiles with admin and user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing three heroâ€‘image related features and the files, components, and test IDs they affect.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and updates of various frontend files.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Asset configuration allowing inclusion of the .well-known directory.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and applying them globally.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, Google Fonts, and root mounting element.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain list specifying allowed hostnames for IC boundary validation.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all major crawlers full access.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling all landing page sections in order.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section displaying business description, trust indicators, and an image.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Static HTML contact form posting to Formspree with required fields.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section combining the contact form with contact details and social links.
Renders a features section with four feature cards and a CTA video link.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays site footer with brand info, navigation links, legal links, and a bottom bar with attribution.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Creates a hero banner with background image, headline, subtext, and buttons that scroll to other sections.
frontend/src/components/LandingHeader.ts: Implements a responsive header with scroll-based styling, navigation links, and a mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/ScheduleConsulta: Provides a booking section that loads and displays a Calendly inline widget on demand.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark CSS variables used for theming, plus global base styles and a custom text-balance utility.
frontend/src/lib/scrollToSection.ts: Provides a smooth scrolling function that navigates to a section by ID with header offset handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors using CSS variables, custom fonts, radii, shadows, animations, and responsive settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, pending requests, versioning, and architectural notes for the Real Estate Landing project.
